entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Gimli
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:00 p.m. CDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 5:53 PM CDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:53 PM CDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 30 percent chance of snow in the evening. Snow beginning overnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 5:53 PM CDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
